bug.author: kskarakostas
bug.description:
Describe the bug When trying to use muse embeddings, for each sentence the language code is printed.
Please have a look at: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/zalandoresearch/flair/blob/31cc245f45b38dbbc4ddfc0214a2761a45b2b3a9/flair/embeddings.py#L581>https://github.com/zalandoresearch/flair/blob/31cc245f45b38dbbc4ddfc0214a2761a45b2b3a9/flair/embeddings.py#L581</denchmark-link>
Expected behavior Train without printing language code for each sentence Environment (please complete the following information):
OS [e.g. iOS, Linux]: Linux Version [e.g. flair-0.3.2]: flair-0.4.3
